DefinitionDescription: In-game milestones. Can have multiple levels of difficulty and are generally gameplay related

Benefits can be sub-categorized into three categories: Pay2Win:benefits that give a clear gameplay avantage that are very hard or impossible to get with gameplay,  Fast-track:benefits that fast-track the early stages of the game to quickly reach a competitive baseline proving small/medium competitive advantage that is reasonably achievable through gameplay, Game-Content:benefits that unlock areas of the game that are very hard or impossible to get with gameplay, Cosmetic:benefits are purely cosmetic, providing no gameplay advantage
Ability to purchase something with real currency or in-game currency + XCurrency
